survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on users' perceptions and satisfaction with the security features of their primary online banking platform.

questions.question_text: Which of the following online banking platforms do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes an open-text field for user input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following online banking platforms do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features does your online banking platform offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections; ensure 'None of the above' deselects other options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with conditional logic.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features does your online banking platform offer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter security-related issues when using your online banking platform?

script.question_text: How often do you encounter security-related issues when using your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: How confident do you feel about the safety of your personal and financial information when using your online banking platform?

script.question_text: How confident do you feel about the safety of your personal and financial information when using your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced unauthorized access to your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'I'm not sure' option for users who may not recall.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced unauthorized access to your online banking account?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, how was the issue resolved?
answer_options: The bank resolved it, but it took time
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, how was the issue resolved?
answer_options: The bank resolved it, but it took time

questions.question_text: How often do you update your online banking password?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to assess password hygiene.

script.question_text: How often do you update your online banking password?

questions.question_text: Do you use the same password for your online banking account as you do for other online accounts?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'I'm not sure' option for users who may not recall.

script.question_text: Do you use the same password for your online banking account as you do for other online accounts?

questions.question_text: What is your primary device for accessing online banking?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary device for accessing online banking?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your online banking platform to others based on its security features?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
